bull_rush.description: Bull Rush: The attacker attempts to push the target back.
bull_rush.formula: attacker_CMB = BAB + STR mod; target_CMD = AC + 10; success if roll + attacker_CMB >= target_CMD

grapple.description: Grapple: The attacker attempts to grapple the target.
grapple.formula: attacker_CMB = BAB + STR mod; target_CMD = AC + 10; success if roll + attacker_CMB >= target_CMD
